TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Palamitan, title = Palamitan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palamitan} }

S.FORM: Palamitan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Palamitan a niyaro', 1,016 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,787 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 826 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,961 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, Bunun 1%, Truku 8%, Tayal 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Palamitan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Palamitan a niyaro', 1,016 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,787 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 826 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,961 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 17%, Bonon 1%, Troko 8%, Tayal 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
